entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 09:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Wet flurries early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1500 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
